system.availability: Comes in bag of 10. Can throw one at their feet as a Half Action creating a 2m wide Dust Cloud with Smoke Quality. Anyone within the cloud has +20 to resist Psychic Powers and Psykers have -20 to all Focus Power and Psyniscience Tests. Can also be thrown up to Strength Bonus Metres. Cloud Dissipates after 1d5 Rounds.
system.cost: Rare Availability in the City of Velkir, where they are found.
